The Prussian Cultural Heritage Foundation confirmed that Hermann Parzinger had received a letter from Zahi Hawass , but said that it was not signed by the prime minister and was not an official demand from the Egyptian state. It added that under a 1912 agreement, artefacts found in the dig were properly listed and photographed, showing clearly their "beauty and quality" , and then divided up between the two sides.

that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" "We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together," Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets' 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.

Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. Before serving 18 months in federal prison on charges related to his role in a dog fighting ring, Michael Vick was the National Football League's highest-paid player and one of the most desired endorsers in sports.
